extension.name: CiviEvent Listing
extension.author: Brian Shaughnessy
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005-2015 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Displays a list of upcoming events configured in CiviCRM. The module will also retrieve all custom data associated with the event and passes it to the module template file (tmpl/default.php). However, it does not display those fields, as they will be specific to your installation. Modify the module template file (which can be done via an override in your main Joomla template folder) to insert those additional fields as desired. Original version by Nakul Ganesh through the Google Summer of Code (2009) program.

field.name: includecss
field.label: Include CSS?
field.description: Indicates if the default module stylesheet should be injected into the rendering.

field.name: noeventtext
field.label: No Events Text
field.description: Text to be shown if no events are found. Leave blank for none.

field.name: link
field.label: Link Destination
field.option: Event Information Page with Register Link

field.name: modal
field.label: Link Style
field.description: Select Modal Link or Normal Link

field.name: maxevents
field.label: Maximum Events Listed
field.description: Maximum number of events to be listed.

field.name: showdates
field.label: Show Dates?
field.description: Indicate if you want the event dates listed.

field.name: dateformat
field.label: Date Format
field.description: Date display in PHP date format

field.name: datezone
field.label: Use Joomla Timezone
field.description: Convert the date using the Joomla timezone setting found in Global Configuration. You may not need this, depending on the configuration of your MySQL DB environment.

field.name: summary
field.label: Display Summary Text?
field.description: Do you want to include event summary text with the listing?

field.name: tid
field.label: Event Types
field.query: SELECT civicrm_option_value.value, civicrm_option_value.label FROM civicrm_option_value INNER JOIN civicrm_option_group ON civicrm_option_value.option_group_id = civicrm_option_group.id WHERE civicrm_option_group.name = 'event_type'

field.name: itemid
field.label: Menu Item
field.description: Select which existing menu item the search result links should be assigned to.
